description: This file contains Python code that sets up and runs two agent instances with different configurations, and outputs their responses to a console, using asyncio for asynchronous execution.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and optional reasoning capabilities.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response of the agent to a given task, with options for streaming and full reasoning display.
